docs.text: Mergebot ¶ Chatops over github issues and pull requests. Config ¶ Add .mergebot.yaml file to the repo to configure how mergebot will work for you. Example ¶ version : 1.0.0 use : mb # change me Commands ¶ /? help /? label {name} /? merge
